content: Expect the lion-headed enemy to be tougher than the rest as you climb the first set of stairs, but defeating it will earn you the Snake Sheriff Spirit.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
Expect the lion-headed enemy to be tougher than the rest as you climb the first set of stairs, but defeating it will earn you the Snake Sheriff Spirit.
